text:
Hi Team,

After installing OpenSSO Policy Agent 3.0 we are getting error *** glibc detected *** /bin/httpd: free(): invalid pointer: 0x00000000176e7660 *** in error_log of apache httpd. Could you please suggest on the same.

System Information
RHEL 5.7 Server
Apache HTTPD 2.2.32
OpenSSO Policy Agent 3.0

Full Error logs

*** glibc detected *** /u01/app/xchange/apache-qnc/bin/httpd: free(): invalid pointer: 0x00000000176e7660 ***
